name: ecoweather
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ecoweather.
Tool description: Economically relevant meteorological data like heat degree days, average temperature. 
API description: Retrieve historical weather data for a location. Dataset lasts back until year 2016. Results are limited to 366 days (1 year)  per request.

lon.description: Longitude of the geo-location in degrees.

lat.description: Latitude of the geo-location in degrees.

to.description:
End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. 

Note: if time period relative to `from` is more than 366 days it will automatically be replaced with this date.
